statements: SELECT * FROM EventBooking ORDER BY booking_id DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM EventBooking WHERE guest_count >= 10;
SELECT booking_id, event_time FROM EventBooking WHERE event_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM EventBooking;
SELECT booking_id, guest_count, booking_status FROM EventBooking WHERE booking_status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM EventBooking WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT booking_id, event_type, guest_count FROM EventBooking WHERE event_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM EventBooking WHERE event_type = 'Wedding';
SELECT booking_id, event_type, event_date, event_time FROM EventBooking WHERE guest_count > 100 ORDER BY event_date ASC, event_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM EventBooking WHERE booking_status IN ('Confirmed', 'Pending') ORDER BY booking_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EventBookings
SELECT booking_id, event_type, booking_date FROM EventBookings WHERE event_type = 'Conference'
SELECT booking_id, event_type, booking_date FROM EventBookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC
SELECT * FROM EventSchedules
SELECT schedule_id, event_id, event_date, start_time, end_time FROM EventSchedules WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31'
SELECT * FROM EventBookings WHERE booking_id = 1;
SELECT event_type, booking_date FROM EventBookings WHERE booking_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT booking_id, event_type, booking_date FROM EventBookings WHERE event_type = 'Conference' AND booking_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EventSchedules WHERE event_date = '2022-05-15' AND start_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT schedule_id, event_id, event_date, start_time FROM EventSchedules WHERE start_time < '13:00:00' ORDER BY event_date ASC, start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM EventBookings;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM EventBookings WHERE event_type = 'music';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_type, event_date FROM EventBookings WHERE event_date >= '2022-07-01';
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM EventBookings ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location, start_time, end_time FROM EventBookings INNER JOIN EventSchedules ON EventBookings.event_id = EventSchedules.event_id;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM EventBookings WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT event_name, location FROM EventBookings JOIN EventSchedules ON EventBookings.event_id = EventSchedules.event_id WHERE start_time > '10:00:00' AND end_time < '14:00:00';
SELECT event_name, setup_type FROM EventBookings JOIN EventSetups ON EventBookings.event_id = EventSetups.event_id WHERE setup_type LIKE '%Audio%';
SELECT event_name, setup_description FROM EventBookings JOIN EventSetups ON EventBookings.event_id = EventSetups.event_id WHERE setup_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM EventBookings WHERE event_type = 'Conference' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM conference_events;
SELECT event_name, start_date, end_date FROM wedding_events WHERE bride_name = 'Alice';
SELECT location, start_date FROM conference_events ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM conference_events WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_id, start_time, end_time, description FROM event_schedules ORDER BY schedule_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM conference_events WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location FROM wedding_events ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT event_id, start_date, end_date, location, bride_name, groom_name FROM wedding_events WHERE location = 'Beach';
SELECT event_id, start_time, end_time, description FROM event_schedules WHERE end_time < '18:00:00';
SELECT event_id, setup_details, required_items, setup_cost FROM event_setups WHERE setup_cost > 1000 ORDER BY setup_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_type='Conference';
SELECT booking_id, customer_name, booking_date FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM venues WHERE venue_location='New York' ORDER BY venue_name;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM events;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM venues;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT booking_id, customer_name, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE booking_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM setups WHERE setup_type = 'Stage' ORDER BY setup_id DESC;
